Package: org.lappsgrid.jupyter.groovy.context

[Groovy] Interface GroovyContext

  • Objects that implement the GroovyContext interface are used to obtain CompilerConfiguration and MetaClass object used by the Groovy compiler when compiler user scripts.

    Authors:
    Keith Suderman

    • Methods Summary

        Methods 
        Type Name and description
        CompilerConfiguration getCompilerConfiguration()
        Obtain a CompilerConfiguration object the Groovy compiler will use when compiling user code.
        MetaClass getMetaClass(Class theClass, boolean initialize)
        Obtain the MetaClass for compiled user code.

    • Method Detail

      • CompilerConfiguration getCompilerConfiguration()

        Obtain a CompilerConfiguration object the Groovy compiler will use when compiling user code.

        Returns:
        an initialized CompilerConfiguration object.

      • MetaClass getMetaClass(Class theClass, boolean initialize)

        Obtain the MetaClass for compiled user code.

        This MetaClass will be used by the Script object obtained by compiling user code. User code will be compiled into a Script object by the Groovy compiler, the script will have its metaClass field set, and thenrun is called.

        Returns:
        Parameters:
        theClass - the class the MetaClass applies to.
        initialize - if the MetaClass should be initialized.
